about_the_game:
Have you deviously sabotaged as a Personoid and survived close calls as a Resident? Now, do it in style with exclusive snazzy outfits and accessories while supporting the further development of First Class Trouble.

Captain's Outfit

You are the Captain now and we have the outfit just for you. SIIC welcomes you into the top of the ranks.
  • Captain's Hat
  • Captain's Shoes
  • Captain's Pipe

Flight Attendant Outfit

You are now able to equip all ranks of our Flight Attendant Outfits ranging from discrete to gold!
  • Flight Attendant White
  • Flight Attendant Bronze
  • Flight Attendant Gold

Ballroom Outfits

Are you feeling like an extra fancy evening? Don't worry, we've got you!
  • Blue Ballroom Dress
  • Green Ballroom Dress
  • Black Tuxedo

More Swimwear!

Want to stand out just a little bit more when working on that tan? Then jump into some of our limited summer additions!
  • Yellow Striped Swimsuit
  • Orange Striped Shorts + Towel
  • Swim fins

3 Unique Hats

The community voted for the Teapot Hat but we wanted them all!
  • Dunce Hat
  • Propeller Hat
  • Teapot Hat

The gratitude of the whole First Class Trouble team

This part is non-refundable and everlasting.

Important note: By buying this DLC pack, you are first and foremost showing your support for the team. The items above are just a bonus!

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy First Class Trouble Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 280X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone and headphones
